rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {4508, M6022}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CPS5001}

description: This unit will consider the theories of Donald Winnicott and Melanie Klein and their relevance to understanding the psychological development of children and adolescents in terms of both healthy development and the development of psychopathology.  The unit will also examine the relevance of these theories to working therapeutically with children and adolescents.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
